result.html: Abair an fhírinneTell the truth.
result.ponchtml: Abair an ḟírinneTell the truth.

result.eng: Tell him to wait for me.
result.html: Abair leis fanacht liomTell him to wait for me.
result.ponchtml: Abair leis fanaċt liomTell him to wait for me.

result.html: Abair liom a bhfuil uaitTell me what you want.
result.ponchtml: Abair liom a ḃfuil uaitTell me what you want.

result.eng: She will accept anything you tell her.
result.ga: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi
result.orig: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi
result.html: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léiShe will accept anything you tell her.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sí le rud ar biṫ a deir tú léiShe will accept anything you tell her.

result.html: Inis an fhírinne domTell me the truth.
result.ponchtml: Inis an ḟírinne domTell me the truth.

result.html: Inis an fhírinneTell the truth.
result.ponchtml: Inis an ḟírinneTell the truth.

result.html: Inis scéal dúinn a dhaidíTell us a story, daddy.
result.ponchtml: Inis scéal dúinn a ḋaidíTell us a story, daddy.

result.eng: Reveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.
result.html: Nocht do chuid tuairimíReveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.
result.ponchtml: Noċt do ċuid tuairimíReveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.

result.eng: When you see her, tell her.
result.ga: Nuair a fheicfidh tú í abair léi
result.orig: Nuair a fheicfidh tú í abair léi
result.html: Nuair a fheicfidh tú í abair léiWhen you see her, tell her.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḟeicfiḋ tú í abair léiWhen you see her, tell her.

result.eng: Tell me about the village. Are there good amenities there?
result.ga: Inis dom faoin sráidbhaile An bhfuil áiseanna maithe ann
result.orig: Inis dom faoin sráidbhaile An bhfuil áiseanna maithe ann
result.html: Inis dom faoin sráidbhaile An bhfuil áiseanna maithe annTell me about the village. Are there good amenities there?
result.ponchtml: Inis dom faoin sráidḃaile An ḃfuil áiseanna maiṫe annTell me about the village. Are there good amenities there?

result.eng: Tell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ga: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.orig: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.html: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ponchtml: Inis dom faoin gcaiṫeaṁ aimsire a ḃíonn agat ó ċeann ceann na seaċtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.

result.eng: What does this tell us about the author?
result.ga: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údar
result.orig: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údar
result.html: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údarWhat does this tell us about the author?
result.ponchtml: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údarWhat does this tell us about the author?

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ga: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.orig: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.html: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ponchtml: Inseoiḋ mise do m'aṫair air é aċ é a ṫeaċt ón ḟarraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.

result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.
